item.title: ISIS can muster 20000 to 31500 fighters, triple previous estimates: CIA - New York Daily News
item.description:
New York Daily News
ISIS can muster 20000 to 31500 fighters, triple previous estimates: CIA
New York Daily News
The CIA estimates that ISIS has more than three times the number of fighters it previously thought. The Islamic State can call upon between 20,000 and 31,500 terrorists throughout Iraq and Syria, according to a spokesman for the intelligence agency.
